fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • We were wrong to say Edward Timpson was standing again as the Conservative candidate in Crewe and Nantwich. Dr Kieran Mullan is due to contest the seat for the Tories (Marginal seats: Battles that will define election, 4 November, page 9). • The surname of an interviewee, Andrew Maksymowski, was misspelled as Nakysmowski (Virgil Abloh fans queue overnight for hype and an Ikea launch, 2 November, page 15). • Other recently corrected articles include: Lorry horror highlights risks migrants take to try to reach UK ‘It’s an escape’: the Americans who want to live like Jane Austen Super-rich prepare to leave UK ‘within minutes’ if Labour wins election
